snippet: Dolce Suono Ensemble of Philadelphia and Lucy Shelton, soprano, performed a program of new music with a lunar motif at Roulette in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Dolce Suono Ensemble of Philadelphia and Lucy Shelton, soprano, performed a program of new music with a lunar motif at Roulette in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Dolce Suono Ensemble and Lucy Shelton at Roulette
headline.main: The New, in Context, for Ear, Heart and Brain
